SEARCH
Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.game.components

Class GoldenCard

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.game.components.NormalCard
IS24_LB11.game.components.GoldenCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardInterface, JsonConvertable, PlayableCard
public class GoldenCard extends NormalCard
Represents a Golden Card in the game, which extends the functionality of a NormalCard by adding specific suits needed and a condition to win points.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • GoldenCard

      public GoldenCard(String id) throws SyntaxException
      Construct a GoldenCard from the information encoded in the given String with the following syntax: char 0-6 : same syntax followed by NormalCard char 7 : represents the card's condition to win its points. Must be parsable into Symbol. In this case ' ' stands for corners and '_' stands for no-condition char 8-12: represent the card's suits needed to be played
      Parameters:
      id - a String containing the encoded information that identify the card
      Throws:
      SyntaxException - if the information are not correctly encoded or missing
      See Also:
      • NormalCard

  • Method Details

    • equals

      public boolean equals(PlayableCard other)
      Checks if this GoldenCard is equal to another PlayableCard. The cards are considered equal if their string representations, with 'B' replaced by 'F', are the same.
      Specified by:
      equals in interface PlayableCard
      Overrides:
      equals in class NormalCard
      Parameters:
      other - the other PlayableCard to compare with
      Returns:
      true if the cards are equal, false otherwise

      Returns the string representation of the GoldenCard.

      Overrides:
      asString in class NormalCard
      Returns:
